article_title: Walker is out of line on Medicaid expansion; lawsuit right and likely
article_text: Worse, he plans to pull it off -- to join 29 other states and the District of Columbia in expanding Medicaid -- while wading in legal quicksand; by pretending he can accept federal money and tell lawmakers to butt out because he simply would be expanding an existing program. It is malarkey. That's not me saying that; it's the Supreme Court.

article_metadata.description: OPINION: Walker's renegade attempt to expand Medicaid in Alaska is wrong for several reasons -- not least because it violates Alaska law.

og.description: OPINION: Walker's renegade attempt to expand Medicaid in Alaska is wrong for several reasons -- not least because it violates Alaska law.
og.title: Walker is out of line on Medicaid expansion; lawsuit right and likely

article_summary:
That's not me saying that; it's the Supreme Court.
It is malarkey.
Worse, he plans to pull it off -- to join 29 other states and the District of Columbia in expanding Medicaid -- while wading in legal quicksand; by pretending he can accept federal money and tell lawmakers to butt out because he simply would be expanding an existing program.
